message: Let's split it 50/50, Bob. What do you say?
I'll give you 40% if you accept now.
I'll give you a slightly better deal. Will you accept?
Take 45% now, it's a good deal!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not getting any younger. Will you accept?
You're getting desperate, I'm getting greedy. Take 60% now!
I'm not getting any more desperate, but I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal. Will you accept?
You're not budging, I won't either. Take 65% now!
